lines: Oh hey! You're actually controlling me? Cool cool cool.
Name's Po. I'm... well, I'm not entirely sure WHAT I am.
Memory's a bit fuzzy. I know I'm a ghost. Skeleton type.
Also I'm apparently running through a bamboo forest? At night?
Look, just help me jump over stuff and we'll figure this out together.
You know what's weird? I keep finding these glowing orbs.
They feel warm. Like music trapped in a marble.
Wait... is that sawdust I smell? And lacquer?
Oh man. I think we're near a luthier's workshop.
Don't know what a luthier is? Makes guitars, fam. Keep up.
OK this is getting spooky. Well, SPOOKIER.
These bamboo stalks have carvings on them...
They look like musical instruments. Old ones. Beautiful ones.
Some say I'm a Holy Ghost. They clearly have no idea.
This is about the closest I get to being holy — running through haunted bamboo.
*gestures at ghost tail* See? Ghost. Not holy. Just... misplaced.
HEY! You're still here! Most people bail by now.
I like you. You've got persistence. Or no life. Either way.
Listen, there's a place up ahead — Shelley Guitar.
Custom builds, wild designs, handcrafted everything.
They invited me to check it out. Probably because I'm dead cool.
...Get it? Dead? Because I'm a skeleton? I'll stop.
Alright! We made it through the Djinn World!
Thanks for running with me. Literally.
Go explore the site — check out the builds, the story, everything.
And if you see any of those glowing orbs lying around... they're MINE.
Po out. *ghost tail dissolve*
